metadata.title: CVE-2014-0054 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The Jaxb2RootElementHttpMessageConverter in Spring MVC in Spring Frameworkbefore 3.2.8 and 4.0.0 before 4.0.2 does not disable external entityresolution, which allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files, cause adenial of service, and conduct CSRF attacks via crafted XML, aka an XMLExternal Entity (XXE) issue.  NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of anincomplete fix for CVE-2013-4152, CVE-2013-7315, and CVE-2013-6429.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-0054` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libspring-aop-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-beans-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-context-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-context-support-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-core-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-expression-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-instrument-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-jdbc-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-jms-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-orm-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-oxm-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-test-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-transaction-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-web-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-web-portlet-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-web-servlet-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libspring-java package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.6.RELEASE-13').
